title: Mapping the discourse on evidence-based policy, artificial intelligence, and the ethical practice of policy analysis
research_description: This paper explores the ethical practice of policy analysis in the context of evidence-based policy and artificial intelligence, applying frame reflection to the case of automated welfare fraud detection in the Netherlands.
research_results: The study demonstrates how frame reflection can provide a more holistic understanding of the impacts of AI-driven decision-making in public policy, particularly in highlighting ethical concerns.
future_research: Future research should explore other applications of AI in public policy through the lens of frame reflection to address potential ethical implications.
